projects.name: Report Builder
projects.description: Part of the client interface for tracking the performance of mobile ad campaigns in real time

text: As part of their mobile advertising service, Playground offers detailed data reporting and analysis on the performance of ads to clients.

projects.name: Ad formats
projects.description: Part of the client interface for tracking the performance of mobile ad campaigns in real time

text: I worked as part of the Playground product team to brainstorm and execute new ideas for ad formats that were not only fun and engaging, but able to be template and deployed through our ad-serving platform. A delicate balance between user, publisher and advertiser needs all needed to be considered.
